✅ Existing Features (v0.1.0/v0.2.0)

These features are currently implemented and working in the framework.

Feature A Description
CLI Core Commands: init, build, watch.
JSON Configuration tailpy.config.json support for colors, screens, spacing.
SCSS Compilation Built-in libsass compiler with @apply directive processing.
Utility Generation Generates atomic CSS classes based on config.
Arbitrary Values Supports JIT-like syntax (e.g., w-[500px], bg-[#ff0000]).
Basic Watch Mode Monitors .scss and .json files (1.0s debounce).

Total Count: 6 Core Features
